headline: CRAFTSMAN® Kicks Off Championship Sunday with Chances to Win Prize Packs Totaling $20,000 in its "V20* Yard Line Giveaway" on Instagram Live
summary: This Championship Sunday, CRAFTSMAN®, the legendary tool brand from Stanley Black & Decker, is bringing fans closer to the action with a live, gamified giveaway that turns every red zone drive into a chance to win big. For the first time ever, CRAFTSMAN is launching a "game within the game" on Instagram, giving football fans the chance to win $20,000 in V20* cordless power tools and retailer gift cards each quarter—just for watching and playing along in real time.
